markdownRemark.html: Eight Poems That, If You Had To Be Trapped In Some Way For a Prolonged Period of Time With Little Hope Of Rescue is a series that demands people imagine some place they could never escape from where they only have eight poems for comfort.

frontmatter.title: EIGHT POEMS…WITH MARIANNE MACRAE
frontmatter.snippet: I’m not sure there’s another poet to have more influence over my work than Luke Kennard. I first read The Solex Brothers back in 2007, when I was but a tender undergraduate and was genuinely astounded that poems were allowed to be this way.
